house_listing.house_description: A favorite the madison by award-winning l.R. Hill. Custom builders, inc. Open airy kitchen, breakfast area, keeping room, den with island fireplace, huge master suite with sitting area, louish bath and huge closet, jack & jull bdrms w/adjoining bath, rog w/ba; sought after great neck.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic Fan, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Microwave,Pantry, Sun Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
